name: The Texting Tree
description: A small Python application that controls an internet-connected Christmas Tree. Input: Twilio SMS. Output: Spark API call.

SPARK_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Your Spark Access Token. You can find this in the Spark Web IDE in 'Settings'

SPARK_CORE_ID.description: Your Spark Core ID. You can find this in the Spark Web IDE in 'Cores'

scripts.postdeploy: heroku config:set HEROKU_URL=$(heroku info -s | grep web_url | cut -d= -f2)
